inviteSubtitle: Meridian Pay is your Stellar smart wallet for swag, transactions, NFTs, and surprises during Meridian.
inviteResendSubtitle: Enter the email you used when you registered for Stellar House Miami.
logInSubtitle: Enter the email you used when you registered for Stellar House Miami.
recoverSubtitle: Enter the email you used when you registered for Stellar House Miami.
resetLinkSent: Success! If your email is registered for Stellar House Miami, you'll receive a link soon.
recoverConfirmSubtitle: Secure your wallet with your device — Touch ID, Face ID, or PIN. Simple, private, and safe.
comingSoonSubtitleLine1: Stellar House goes live on Dec 4, 2025.
walletHomeProductListButtonDescription: Visit the Stellar booth to claim your items
airdropBannerDescriptionA: Claim to receive XLM from SDF!
airdropBannerDescriptionB: Woohoo! Claim with your passkey below to receive XLM from SDF!
noTransactionHistoryDescription: You don't have any transactions yet
invalidQrCode: This QR code isn't valid. Please try another one
nftModalDescription: Confirm the transaction to claim your NFT. Show this NFT to redeem a special gift for this session.
claimNftDescription1: Claim your NFT! You can view it in your wallet and use it to track your session attendance.
claimNftDescription2: Claim your treasure hunt NFT! This limited edition NFT was made by an artist just for Meridian.
noNftsListDescription: Claim NFTs by attending sessions or treasure hunting around the venue!
viewNftDrawerSubtitle: This NFT is proof of attendance.
viewNftDrawerDisclaimer: Transfer is not supported yet. You can transfer at the end of the conference.
specialGiftClaimedDescription: Looks like you already received an extra swag token!
specialGiftModalTitle: You've unlocked an extra swag token!
specialGiftModalDescription: Claim your token and go to the SDF booth to redeem your special gift!
specialGiftModalNote: Note: swag is subject to availability.
shareImageNotSupportedDevice: Your device doesn't support sharing this way. You can try a different browser or device
shareImageError: Something went wrong while sharing. Please try again
shareImageText: Move this image where you need it
webauthnNotSupportedError: Your browser does not support WebAuthn. Please use a modern browser that supports security keys or biometrics
webauthnInvalidStateError: This action cannot be completed right now. Please refresh the page or try again
webauthnInvalidStateErrorAuthenticatorAl: Looks like you already have a passkey registered. Please log in or delete the existing passkey to register a new one
webauthnNotAllowedError: The operation either cancelled, timed out, or was not allowed
webauthnSecurityError: This action is blocked for security reasons. Make sure you are using a secure connection and the correct site
webauthnConstraintError: Some required information is missing or not valid. Please check your input and try again
specialGiftRouteLoadingDescription: We're syncing your photo right now. This won't take long
stuckWalletRouteLoadingDescription: We're having trouble right now. Please try again later.
defaultWalletRouteErrorDescription: We're experiencing an issue right now. Please try again later.
walletStatusError: Wallet setup failed. Please retry or contact support if the issue continues.
transferLeftAssetsBannerDescriptionA: Transfer your remaining XLM and NFTs so you don't lose access!
transferLeftAssetsBannerDescriptionB: It's time to move your remaining XLM and NFTs to a long-term Stellar wallet so you don't lose access after Stellar House.
walletAddressFormNoWalletLink: Don't have a wallet yet? Try Freighter
transferNftsAlertTitle: You can send NFTs to any Stellar address but not all wallets display them appropriately. Freighter does!
requiredWalletAddressError: Please enter a destination wallet address
invalidClassicWalletAddressError: Use a wallet address starting with G
restrictedWalletAddressError: This account requires memo. Use different one.
transferNftsSelectNftError: Please select at least one NFT to transfer
transferNftsSelectNftExceededError: For smooth and reliable transfers, transfer NFTs in groups of 10. If you have more, please make multiple transfers.
transferNftsReviewModalDisclaimer: For the best experience, use a wallet that offers NFT compatibility
transferAssetsOrganizationListDescriptio: Donate XLM to trusted organizations on Stellar (you're awesome!). Any leftover XLM can be transferred to another Stellar wallet.
transferAssetsStandardTransferDescriptio: Transfer any remaining XLM to a personal Stellar wallet.
transferAssetsStandardTransferDisclaimer: Do not transfer to accounts that require a Stellar memo, including exchanges like Coinbase. You could lose funds.
confirmTransferDrawerDescription1: Please note that do not transfer to accounts that
confirmTransferDrawerDescription2: require a Stellar memo, including exchanges
confirmTransferDrawerDescription3: like Coinbase. You could lose funds.
behindScenesBannerTitleA: Wondering how the Meridian Pay wallet you used at Stellar House was built?
behindScenesBannerTitleB: That's a wrap on Stellar House Miami!
behindScenesBannerDescriptionA: Check out our open-source projects and see how experiences like Meridian Pay are built on Stellar.
behindScenesBannerDescriptionB: But builders keep on building. Peek behind the scenes of Meridian Pay below and start building your own Stellar wallet today.
leftSwagsBannerDescription: Head to the SDF booth to buy what you want before it's gone!
webviewWarningTitle: Passkey not supported in this environment
webviewWarningButtonText: Open in a browser for full functionality
routeNotFoundDescription: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.
walletComingSoonBannerDescription: Stellar House goes live on Dec 4, 2025
